name: Dogebits (DRC-20)
description: $DBIT stands for Dogebits, a purposeful subdivision and smaller unit within the world's largest meme Dogecoin blockchain and ecosystem. It is a DRC-20 token built on the Dogecoin blockchain using the Doginals Protocol, inspired by the Ordinals Protocol BRC-20 on Bitcoin. As a user-friendly cryptocurrency, $DBIT is designed to seemingly integrate into the Dogecoin and Doginals ecosystems. Its microtransaction-friendly nature of the 2.1 quadrillion Dogebits in combination with low gas fees, makes it well-suited for small transactions, currency of metaverses, tipping, everyday use, rewards, DApps on the Dogecoin blockchain that leverage large token supply such as DeFi, In-Game Economies, Social Platforms and Marketplaces.
